fields.name: length

fields.description: The number of characters of the constrained `string` type

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The `anydata` type value to be constrained

parameters.name: td
parameters.description: The type descriptor of the value to be constrained

returnParameters.description: The type descriptor of the value which is validated or else an `constraint:Error` in case of an error

functions.name: validate
functions.description:
Validates the provided value against the configured annotations. Additionally, if the type of the value is different
from the expected return type then the value will be cloned with the contextually expected type before the validation.

annotations.name: Array
annotations.description: The annotation, which is used for the constraints of the `anydata[]` type.

annotations.name: Date
Float
annotations.description: The annotation, which is used for the constraints of the `float` type.

annotations.name: Int
annotations.description: The annotation, which is used for the constraints of the `int` type.

annotations.name: Number
annotations.description: The annotation, which is used for the constraints of the `int`, `float`, and `decimal` types.

annotations.name: String
annotations.description: The annotation, which is used for the constraints of the `string` type.

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Represents the generic error type of the module.

errors.name: TypeConversionError
errors.description: Represents the errors occurs during the type conversion.

errors.name: ValidationError
errors.description: Represents the errors occurs during constraint validations.

members.name: PAST
members.description: validates whether the date is in the past

members.name: PAST_OR_PRESENT
members.description: validates whether the date is in the past or present

members.name: FUTURE
members.description: validates whether the date is in the future

members.name: FUTURE_OR_PRESENT
members.description: validates whether the date is in the future or present

enums.name: DateOption
enums.description: Represents the date option to be validated.

modules.summary: This module provides features to validate the values with respect to the constraints defined to the respective Ballerina types.

from the expected return type then the value will be cloned with the contextually expected type before the validation.
